1521790.name: Eugenes Dream The Daily Ins And Outs Of A Sane Robot In An Insane World Demo
1521790.description:
Eugene (our hero and might I say he's looking good) wakes in small trading town, he decides he should probably ask around for some info mind you the villagers do seem to be insane robots...

Featuring dark humour and a satirical end showing what would really happen in most RPG worlds


Note: This level isn't in the full game and acts more as a taster of the humour found within Eugene's Dream: Daily Ins And Outs Of A Sane Robot In An Insane World
1521790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
